item.title: Drop.com (former Massdrop) spam
item.description: I just bought a mechanical keyboard from Drop. I didn’t sign up for any mailing lists, but here’s how they rewarded me after giving them $ 225: This is only about a week’s worth of emails, that I didn’t sign up for. To top it off, from the unsubscribe link you’ve to separate click to unsubscribe for each different subject: This is clearly a dark pattern to punish those who wish to unsubscribe.
